pageProps.content:
["$r",null,null,{"children":[["$r","p",null,{"children":["$r","strong",null,{"children":["注：该镜像是 Homebrew 二进制预编译包的镜像。镜像站同时提供 Homebrew 的 formula 索引的镜像（即 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"brew update"}]," 时所更新内容），请参考 ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"/homebrew/","children":"Homebrew 镜像使用帮助"}],"。"]}]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["TUNA/USTC 以及以 TUNA/USTC 为上游的镜像站均提供了 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"HOMEBREW_API_DOMAIN"}]," 的接口；SJTUG 暂未提供该接口。"]}],"
",["$r","h3",null,{"id":"临时替换","children":"临时替换"}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"code":"export HOMEBREW_API_DOMAIN="{{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}/api"
export HOMEBREW_BOTTLE_DOMAIN="{{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}"","codeLanguage":"bash"}],"
",["$r","h3",null,{"id":"长期替换","children":"长期替换"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"如果你使用 bash："}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"code":"echo 'export HOMEBREW_API_DOMAIN="{{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}/api"' >> ~/.bash_profile
echo 'export HOMEBREW_BOTTLE_DOMAIN="{{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}"' >> ~/.bash_profile
export HOMEBREW_API_DOMAIN="{{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}/api"
export HOMEBREW_BOTTLE_DOMAIN="{{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}"","codeLanguage":"bash"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"如果你使用 zsh："}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"code":"echo 'export HOMEBREW_API_DOMAIN="{{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}/api"' >> ~/.zprofile
echo 'export HOMEBREW_BOTTLE_DOMAIN="{{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}"' >> ~/.zprofile
export HOMEBREW_API_DOMAIN="{{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}/api"
export HOMEBREW_BOTTLE_DOMAIN="{{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}"","codeLanguage":"bash"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["$r","strong",null,{"children":["注：Linuxbrew 核心仓库（",["$r","code",null,{"children":"linuxbrew-core"}],"）自 2021 年 10 月 25 日（",["$r","code",null,{"children":"brew"}]," 版本 3.3.0 起）被弃用，Linuxbrew 用户应迁移至 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"homebrew-core"}],"。Linuxbrew 用户请依本镜像说明重新设置镜像。"]}]}]]}]

meta.title: Homebrew Bottles 软件仓库镜像使用帮助
